title: Unnamed Fan Gets Bugsnax Devs to Add DLC Trophies - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.01.21
description:
Go to http://joinhoney.com/games to get Honey for free!

Go to http://american-giant.com and use code KFGD to get 20% off!

Go to http://creditkarma.com/loanoffers to find the loan for you!

Blessing and Tim talk about a Sega & Microsoft collaboration, Roger does a review for Unpacking, and an unnamed fan is very broken up about trophies in the Bugsnax DLC.

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:48 - Housekeeping
Over the weekend, the final episode of The Arkham Files went up. That is Barrett’s breakdown of the Arkham series. This final episode is all about Arkham Knight. That’s up right now for your viewing pleasure on youtube.com/kindafunnygames.
Right after this episode of KFGD, the battle for the CEO of Kinda Funny continues in Mario Party Superstars. This time around it’s Nick, Kevin, Barrett, and Roger competing to see who will lead Kinda Funny now that Greg is gone on Paternity leave. That’s going down right here on Twitch.tv/kindafunnygames and later on Youtube.com/kindafunnyplays.
Later today we’re recording PS I Love You XOXO over on Patreon and if you’re a Patreon supporter you can write in with your reader mail. This week’s episode will be all about the STATE of State of Play so write in with what your thoughts are on PlayStation’s latest showing and Janet and I will discuss your write-ins.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
The Roper Report -

00:07:50 - Sega and Microsoft have announced ‘a strategic alliance’ around cloud - Andy Robinson @ VGC

00:16:33 - A NEW ROPER REPORT SEGMENT, ROGER REVIEWS: Unpacking

00:24:19 - Nintendo Shutters its California And Toronto Offices - Ethan Gach @ Kotaku

00:27:35 - Thanks to unnamed fan, Bugsnax's Isle Of Bigsnax DLC Will Now Have New Trophies - George Yang @ Gamespot

00:31:28 - Ad  

00:37:45 - One to keep an eye on: Open-world action RPG, Honor of Kings: World has been announced - Sal Romano @ Gematsu

00:41:20 - It’s official: No more Cyberpunk updates in 2021 - Matt Kim @ IGN

00:44:00 - PAX South cancelled "for the foreseeable future" - Brendan Sinclair @ GiBiz

00:47:03 - Out today

00:51:20 - Squad Up: Moda(Xbox/PC)

00:51:58 - You‘re Wrong

Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Whitta

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
